page.title: 12MY FAVOURITE SUBJECT
page.content: My favourite subject at school is swimming.The size off the pool is 7.5 metres length ways and 5 metres width ways,and nearly 1 metre deep.It is out of doors and is not heated.It is painted blue.In the summer we use it everyday if the temperature is over 60.It is also in use in the summer holidays for 10p a go,but it is only opened to playgroup children and children who go to the school.We have two changing rooms,one for the girls and one for the boys.They are not very big and have got benches and pegs in them.We have a cover which we put on every night which makes the pool warmer.
